short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and visualize multuple Elasticsearch endpoints from within this Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THANK YOU FOR 80K USERS! 
--> (Plugin will not be working without upgrading to Manifest v3) <--

==New version 0.4.3==
Modify new connection modal dialog to have username and password field separately to avoid confusion and some color improvements

==New version 0.4.2==
Margin fix.

==New version 0.4.1==
Bug fixes.. (Any request/Structured Request)

==New version 0.4==
1. Upgrade to manifest v3
2. Some improvement to UI
3. Hide credential in dropdown bar
4. Add View Index menu to hide system index
5. Bigger font size (as requested!) (You can still always use Ctrl+ "+" and Ctrl+ "-" to adjust font size)
6. Other minor improvements

==Improvement over famous Elasticsearch Head==
1. Save and store several Elasticsearch end-points
2. More column in Index Tab
3. Any Request can now handle JSON return like those from /_cat/indices
4. More minimal look (smaller fonts, etc...)
